Key Arguments: The proposed legislation would suppress freedom of speech and debate.
The government has previously misled the public during the COVID-19 pandemic.
Existing laws already protect against hate speech and threats.
The government and mainstream media have been complicit in spreading misinformation.
Alternative media and social media provide necessary platforms for dissenting views.
Notable Quotes: Your power must really be tenuous if the only way you can hold onto it is by suppressing any and all debate.
Democracy dies in darkness and apparently, ACMA by obeying those who would use their power to silence our voices, would be conspiring with vested interests to keep Australia in permanent night.
The answer to scientific or political controversies isn’t more censorship – it’s more debate.
